product_name: Igloo Yukon Cold Locker Cooler - 70 qt.
long_description: Out-haul, outlast and out-chill the competition with the 70 qt. Igloo Yukon Cold Locker cooler. It has room for food and drinks, and it stand ups to abuse that comes with your adventurous lifestyle. Rugged polyethylene construction with 3 in. of foam in the lid and 2 in. in the body provides excellent insulation to keep ice cold for up to 7 days in 90degF temperatures. Rugged, wide integrated handles are easy to grasp with gloves on; handles double as tie-down loops. Raised, textured work surface on the lid; lid includes a measuring scale for determining whether or not your fish is a keeper. Oversized, tethered drain plug for easy draining and cleaning. Elevated design allows airflow underneath the cooler to improve cooling performance. All stainless-steel hinge pins and hardware ensure many years of use. Lid on the Igloo Yukon Cold Locker cooler can be locked shut for security (locks sold separately).
short_description: Out-haul, outlast and out-chill the competition with the 70 qt. Igloo Yukon Cold Locker cooler. It has room for food and drinks, and it stand ups to abuse that comes with your adventurous lifestyle.
